name: Air Fryer Pepperoni Pizza Quesadillas
description: Crispy tortilla quesadillas with mozzarella, pepperoni, and herby tomato sauce, finished in the air fryer. Family-friendly and ready fast.
prep_steps: Lay out 8 tortillas on a board.
Drain any excess liquid from mozzarella if needed and pat dry.
In a small bowl, stir tomato sauce with italian seasoning.
Lightly brush one side of each tortilla with olive oil (this will be the outside).
Set out salad and dressing for serving.
cook_steps: Flip 4 tortillas so oiled side is down. Spread 1–2 tablespoons of the seasoned tomato sauce on each.
Top each with mozzarella, pepperoni, and a little more mozzarella. Cap with a second tortilla, oiled side up.
Air fry 1–2 quesadillas at a time for 5–6 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden and cheese is melted.
Microwave the remaining tomato sauce for 30–45 seconds to warm as a dip.
Slice quesadillas into wedges and serve with warm sauce and salad.
